title: Full Exceptional Sequence for a Fine Quiver Moduli Space
abstract:
We consider the fine quiver moduli space of representations of the
3-Kronecker quiver of dimension vector $(2,3)$, which is a blow down of the
Hilbert scheme of 3 points on $\mathds{P}^2$. A short description of its
geometry and Chow ring is given. Then we exhibit an exceptional sequence for
the derived category by understanding a $\mathds{P}^1$-bundle over it and using
Teleman Quantization. The fullness of the exceptional sequence is proved by
using a covering argument and computations of mutations.
